displayName.english: After breaking eggs three times, I vaguely felt unwell. ( Try to just praise Xueqi)

displayName.tchinese: 三次踹蛋，痛不欲生（試試只誇雪琪吧）

displayName.english: A ball from the sky

Now, I've really been killed.

The consequence of not looking where you're going

Laying bare one's heart and lungs" or "Baring one's soul

Like attracts like

Far ahead

Indeed ominous

Perish together

displayName.tchinese: 肥皂落地，死因不可告人

displayName.english: The outcome of awkward conversation
Killed by the three axe blows
Expired spicy strips can be deadly!
Died from falling just like this
Curiosity killed the cat
Cute little things can also be deadly
The consequence of casually complimenting a girl
Infected or not infected, It's a question
displayName.schinese: 感染还是没感染，It's a question
displayName.tchinese: 感染還是沒感染，It's a question

displayName.english: Can't hold it in, can only die.

displayName.english: Fleeing for life, met a tragic end
Butt's safety compromised 1
Butt's safety compromised 2
Had the iron rod snatched, counter-killed
Fell in love with a zombie
Zombie's heavy blow, hit the vital spot
Crying for help in the cave for 200 hours, no rescue, parched
displayName.schinese: 洞里呼唤200小时无人救援，口干舌燥
displayName.tchinese: 洞裡呼喚200小時無人救援，口乾舌燥

displayName.english: The more you climb, the slipperier it gets, despair at the bottom of the pit
Rescue has not arrived after a long time
Managed to get a kiss before dying
Failed seduction, met with counter-kill
Deception failed, met with counter-kill
Died in an embrace with a beauty due to the volatilization of an unknown substance
displayName.schinese: 不明物质挥发，相拥而去
displayName.tchinese: 不明物質揮發，相擁而去

displayName.english: Died in an unexpected explosion, met a fitting end
Killed by a blade amidst the peony flowers, even as a ghost, one remains a debonair spirit.
displayName.schinese: 牡丹刀下死，做鬼也疯流
displayName.tchinese: 牡丹刀下死，做鬼也瘋流

Being too clever by half, cut the throat with scissors
Beaten up by a group of beauties, in unbearable pain

A variety of methods, the slow and painful execution

Looking back again, the figure has already walked far away
